ne5:1.2: “Yam pucchitanca vissajjitanca”ti gatha, ayam vicayo haro.
ne5:2.2: Padam vicinati, panham vicinati, visajjanam vicinati, pubbaparam vicinati, assadam vicinati, adinavam vicinati, nissaranam vicinati, phalam vicinati, upayam vicinati, anattim vicinati, anugitim vicinati, sabbe nava suttante vicinati.
ne5:2.3: Yatha kim bhave, yatha ayasma ajito parayane bhagavantam panham pucchati—
ne5:4.1: Imani cattari padani pucchitani, so eko panho.
ne5:4.4: “kenassu nivuto loko”ti lokadhitthanam pucchati, “kenassu nappakasati”ti lokassa appakasanam pucchati, “kissabhilepanam brusi”ti lokassa abhilepanam pucchati, “kimsu tassa mahabbhayan”ti tasseva lokassa mahabhayam pucchati.
ne5:7.1: Imani cattari padani imehi catuhi padehi visajjitani pathamam pathamena, dutiyam dutiyena, tatiyam tatiyena, catuttham catutthena.
ne5:8.1: “Kenassu nivuto loko”ti panhe “avijjaya nivuto loko”ti visajjana.
ne5:8.2: Nivaranehi nivuto loko, avijjanivarana hi sabbe satta.
ne5:8.3: Yathaha bhagava “sabbasattanam, bhikkhave, sabbapananam sabbabhutanam pariyayato ekameva nivaranam vadami yadidam avijja, avijjanivarana hi sabbe satta.
ne5:8.4: Sabbasova, bhikkhave, avijjaya nirodha caga patinissagga natthi sattanam nivarananti vadami”ti.
ne5:8.5: Tena ca pathamassa padassa visajjana yutta.
ne5:9.2: Yo puggalo nivaranehi nivuto, so vivicchati.
ne5:9.4: So vicikicchanto nabhisaddahati, na abhisaddahanto viriyam narabhati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya kusalanam dhammanam sacchikiriyaya.
ne5:9.5: So idhappamadamanuyutto viharati pamatto, sukke dhamme na uppadiyati, tassa te anuppadiyamana nappakasanti, yathaha bhagava—
ne5:11.1: Tena ca dutiyassa padassa visajjana yutta.
ne5:14.1: Sayam tanha asattibahulassa puggalassa “evam abhijappa”ti karitva tattha loko abhilitto nama bhavati, tena ca tatiyassa padassa visajjana yutta.
ne5:15.1: “Kim su tassa mahabbhayan”ti panhe “dukkhamassa mahabbhayan”ti visajjana.
ne5:15.4: Yam kayikam idam dukkham, yam cetasikam idam domanassam.
ne5:15.5: Sabbe satta hi dukkhassa ubbijjanti, natthi bhayam dukkhena samasamam, kuto va pana tassa uttaritaram?
ne5:15.8: Tattha loko odhaso kadaci karahaci dukkhadukkhataya muccati.
ne5:15.12: Sankharadukkhataya pana loko anupadisesaya nibbanadhatuya muccati, tasma sankharadukkhata dukkham lokassati katva dukkhamassa mahabbhayanti.
ne5:15.13: Tena ca catutthassa padassa visajjana yutta.
ne5:17.5: Evam samapannassa lokassa evam sankilitthassa kim lokassa vodanam vutthanamiti, evanhi aha.
ne5:18.2: Tattha ya abhijjha ayam lobho akusalamulam, yo byapado ayam doso akusalamulam, yo pamado ayam moho akusalamulam.
ne5:18.3: Tassevam asamahitassa chasu ayatanesu tanha savanti rupatanha saddatanha gandhatanha rasatanha photthabbatanha dhammatanha, yathaha bhagava—
ne5:19.1: “Savati”ti ca kho, bhikkhave, channetam ajjhattikanam ayatananam adhivacanam.
ne5:19.2: Cakkhu savati manapikesu rupesu, amanapikesu patihannatiti.
ne5:19.7: mano savati manapikesu dhammesu amanapikesu patihannatiti.
ne5:19.8: Iti sabba ca savati, sabbatha ca savati.
ne5:20.1: “Sotanam kim nivaranan”ti pariyutthanavighatam pucchati, idam vodanam.
ne5:20.2: “Sotanam samvaram bruhi, kena sota pidhiyare”ti anusayasamugghatam pucchati, idam vutthanam.
ne5:23.1: Kayagataya satiya bhavitaya bahulikataya cakkhu navinchati manapikesu rupesu, amanapikesu na patihannati, sotam …pe…
ne5:23.5: mano navinchati manapikesu dhammesu, amanapikesu na patihannati.
ne5:24.1: Pannaya anusaya pahiyanti, anusayesu pahinesu pariyutthana pahiyanti.
ne5:24.3: Tam yatha khandhavantassa rukkhassa anavasesamuluddharane kate pupphaphalapallavankurasantati samucchinna bhavati.
ne5:24.4: Evam anusayesu pahinesu pariyutthanasantati samucchinna bhavati pidahita paticchanna.
ne5:27.4: Tini ca saccani sankhatani nirodhadhammani dukkham samudayo maggo, nirodho asankhato.
ne5:27.5: Tattha samudayo dvisu bhumisu pahiyati dassanabhumiya ca bhavanabhumiya ca.
ne5:27.6: Dassanena tini samyojanani pahiyanti sakkayaditthi vicikiccha silabbataparamaso, bhavanaya satta samyojanani pahiyanti kamacchando byapado ruparago aruparago mano uddhaccam avijjavasesa.
ne5:27.7: Tedhatuke imani dasa samyojanani pancorambhagiyani pancuddhambhagiyani.
ne5:28.1: Tattha tini samyojanani sakkayaditthi vicikiccha silabbataparamaso anannatannassamitindriyam adhitthaya nirujjhanti.
ne5:28.2: Satta samyojanani kamacchando byapado ruparago aruparago mano uddhaccam avijjavasesa annindriyam adhitthaya nirujjhanti.
ne5:28.3: Yam pana evam janati “khina me jati”ti, idam khaye nanam.
ne5:28.6: Tattha yanca anannatannassamitindriyam yanca annindriyam, imani aggaphalam arahattam papunantassa nirujjhanti, tattha yanca khaye nanam yanca anuppade nanam, imani dve nanani ekapanna.
ne5:29.1: Api ca arammanasanketena dve namani labbhanti, “khina me jati”ti pajanantassa khaye nananti namam labhati, “naparam itthattaya”ti pajanantassa anuppade nananti namam labhati.
ne5:29.2: Sa pajananatthena panna, yathadittham apilapanatthena sati.
ne5:30.2: Tattha ye phassapancamaka dhamma, idam namam.
ne5:30.4: Tadubhayam namarupam vinnanasampayuttam tassa nirodham bhagavantam pucchanto ayasma ajito parayane evamaha—
ne5:32.1: Tattha sati ca panna ca cattari indriyani, sati dve indriyani satindriyanca samadhindriyanca, panna dve indriyani pannindriyanca viriyindriyanca.
ne5:32.2: Ya imesu catusu indriyesu saddahana okappana, idam saddhindriyam.
ne5:32.3: Tattha ya saddhadhipateyya cittekaggata, ayam chandasamadhi.
ne5:32.4: Samahite citte kilesanam vikkhambhanataya patisankhanabalena va bhavanabalena va, idam pahanam.
ne5:32.5: Tattha ye assasapassasa vitakkavicara sannavedayita sarasankappa, ime sankhara.
ne5:32.6: Iti purimako ca chandasamadhi, kilesavikkhambhanataya ca pahanam ime ca sankhara, tadubhayam chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
ne5:32.7: Tattha ya viriyadhipateyya cittekaggata, ayam viriyasamadhi …pe…
ne5:32.8: tattha ya cittadhipateyya cittekaggata, ayam cittasamadhi …pe…
ne5:32.9: tattha ya vimamsadhipateyya cittekaggata, ayam vimamsasamadhi.
ne5:32.10: Samahite citte kilesanam vikkhambhanataya patisankhanabalena va bhavanabalena va, idam pahanam.
ne5:32.11: Tattha ye assasapassasa vitakkavicara sannavedayita sarasankappa, ime sankhara.
ne5:32.12: Iti purimako ca vimamsasamadhi, kilesavikkhambhanataya ca pahanam ime ca sankhara, tadubhayam vimamsasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
ne5:35.1: Iti vivatena cetasa apariyonaddhena sappabhasam cittam bhaveti.
ne5:35.2: Pancindriyani kusalani cittasahabhuni citte uppajjamane uppajjanti, citte nirujjhamane nirujjhanti.
ne5:35.3: Namarupanca vinnanahetukam vinnanapaccaya nibbattam, tassa maggena hetu upacchinno, vinnanam anaharam anabhinanditam appatisandhikam tam nirujjhati.
ne5:35.4: Namarupamapi ahetu appaccayam punabbhavam na nibbattayati.
ne5:35.5: Evam vinnanassa nirodha panna ca sati ca namarupanca nirujjhati.
ne5:38.1: Imani tini padani pucchitani, te tayo panha.
ne5:38.4: “Ye ca sankhatadhammase”ti arahattam pucchati, “ye ca sekkha puthu idha”ti sekham pucchati, “tesam me nipako iriyam, puttho pabruhi marisa”ti vipassanapubbangamam pahanam pucchati.
ne5:41.1: Bhagavato sabbam kayakammam nanapubbangamam nananuparivatti, sabbam vacikammam nanapubbangamam nananuparivatti, sabbam manokammam nanapubbangamam nananuparivatti.
ne5:41.2: Atite amse appatihatananadassanam, anagate amse appatihatananadassanam, paccuppanne amse appatihatananadassanam.
ne5:42.2: Yam anicce dukkhe anattani ca annanam adassanam, ayam nanadassanassa patighato.
ne5:42.3: Yatha idha puriso tarakarupani passeyya, no ca gananasanketena janeyya, ayam nanadassanassa patighato.
ne5:43.1: Bhagavato pana appatihatananadassanam, anavaranananadassana hi buddha bhagavanto.
ne5:43.2: Tattha sekhena dvisu dhammesu cittam rakkhitabbam gedha ca rajaniyesu dhammesu, dosa ca pariyutthaniyesu.
ne5:43.3: Tattha ya iccha muccha patthana piyayana kilana, tam bhagava nivarento evamaha—
ne5:44.2: Tatha hi sekho abhigijjhanto asamuppannanca kilesam uppadeti, uppannanca kilesam phatim karoti.
ne5:44.3: Yo pana anavilasankappo anabhigijjhanto vayamati, so anuppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam anuppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
ne5:44.4: So uppannanam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
ne5:44.5: So anuppannanam kusalanam dhammanam uppadaya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
ne5:44.6: So uppannanam kusalanam dhammanam thitiya asammosaya bhiyyobhavaya vepullaya bhavanaya paripuriya chandam janeti vayamati viriyam arabhati cittam pagganhati padahati.
ne5:45.2: Kamavitakko byapadavitakko vihimsavitakko, ime anuppanna papaka akusala dhamma.
ne5:45.4: Anusaya akusalamulani, ime uppanna papaka akusala dhamma.
ne5:45.6: Yani sotapannassa indriyani, ime anuppanna kusala dhamma.
ne5:45.8: Yani atthamakassa indriyani, ime uppanna kusala dhamma.
ne5:46.4: Yena uppannuppanne papake akusale dhamme pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti nadhivaseti, idam pannindriyam.
ne5:46.5: Ya imesu catusu indriyesu saddahana okappana, idam saddhindriyam.
ne5:47.11: Evam sekho sabbehi kusalehi dhammehi appamatto vutto bhagavata anavilataya manasa.
ne5:48.1: “Kusalo sabbadhammanan”ti loko nama tividho kilesaloko bhavaloko indriyaloko.
ne5:48.2: Tattha kilesalokena bhavaloko samudagacchati, so indriyani nibbatteti, indriyesu bhaviyamanesu neyyassa parinna bhavati.
ne5:48.3: Sa duvidhena upaparikkhitabba dassanaparinnaya ca bhavanaparinnaya ca.
ne5:48.4: Yada hi sekho neyyam parijanati, tada nibbidasahagatehi sannamanasikarehi neyyam parinnatam bhavati.
ne5:49.4: Yam dhammanam salakkhane nanam dhammapatisambhida ca atthapatisambhida ca, ayam abhinna.
ne5:50.2: Evam abhijanitva ya parijanana “idam kusalam, idam akusalam, idam savajjam, idam anavajjam, idam kanham, idam sukkam, idam sevitabbam, idam na sevitabbam, ime dhamma evangahita, idam phalam nibbattenti, tesam evangahitanam ayam attho”ti, ayam parinna.
ne5:51.1: Evam parijanitva tayo dhamma avasittha bhavanti pahatabba bhavetabba sacchikatabba ca.
ne5:51.8: Yo evam janati ayam vuccati atthakusalo dhammakusalo kalyanatakusalo phalatakusalo, ayakusalo apayakusalo upayakusalo mahata kosallena samannagatoti, tenaha bhagava “kusalo sabbadhammanan”ti.
ne5:52.1: “Sato bhikkhu paribbaje”ti tena ditthadhammasukhaviharattham abhikkante patikkante alokite vilokite saminjite pasarite sanghatipattacivaradharane asite pite khayite sayite uccarapassavakamme gate thite nisinne sutte jagarite bhasite tunhibhave satena sampajanena vihatabbam.
ne5:52.2: Ima dve cariya anunnata bhagavata eka visuddhanam, eka visujjhantanam.
ne5:52.8: Yam bojjham, tam catubbidham dukkhassa parinnabhisamayena samudayassa pahanabhisamayena maggassa bhavanabhisamayena nirodhassa sacchikiriyabhisamayena, idam catubbidham bojjham yo evam janati, ayam vuccati sato abhikkamati sato patikkamati khaya ragassa khaya dosassa khaya mohassa.
ne5:54.2: Suttassa ca anugiti atthato ca byanjanato ca samanetabba.
ne5:54.4: Dunnikkhittassa padabyanjanassa atthopi dunnayo bhavati, tasma atthabyanjanupetam sangayitabbam.
ne5:54.6: Kim idam suttam ahacca vacanam anusandhivacanam nitattham neyyattham sankilesabhagiyam nibbedhabhagiyam asekkhabhagiyam?
ne5:54.7: Kuhim imassa suttassa sabbani saccani passitabbani, adimajjhapariyosaneti?
ne5:54.10: “yam pucchitanca vissajjitanca, suttassa ya ca anugiti”ti.
